reviewText:
Beware of this company-Global Treasures..

It takes hours to explore Hadrian's Villa (aka Villa Adriana).

A quality documentary on the subject would need 30-40-60 minutes to properly treat the subject.

This DVD is ONLY 10 minutes in length!!!!
Too short to do its subject justice, this DVD also does not make use of reconstructions, etc., that might bring its subject to life.
